title: Blended Learning Course Design Utilizing Social and Participatory Media

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and social media usage experience
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate in online and offline environments, using personal smart devices (tablets/laptops) to participate in real-time feedback and content creation. Self-directed learning competencies are strengthened through 1:1 mentoring and peer evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of creating and sharing educational content using social media
Learners design and implement group collaboration projects using participatory online tools (Padlet, Google Jamboard, etc.)
Learners can analyze their learning processes and propose improvement strategies by applying action research methodology

resources: Social media platforms (TikTok, Instagram, YouTube Shorts, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
